00056 Document::Document()
00057 :
00058   m_scene(0),
00059   m_isModified( false )
00060 {
00061     InitializeScene();
00062 }
00063 
00067 Document::~Document()
00068 {
00069 }
00070 
00074 void Document::SetDocumentModified( bool status )
00075 {
00076     m_isModified = status;
00077 }
00078 
00082 void Document::InitializeScene()
00083 {
00084     if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00085 
00086         m_scene = new TSceneKit;
00087         m_scene->ref();
00088     m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );
00089 }
00090 
00094 void Document::New()
00095 {
00096     InitializeScene();
00097         m_isModified = false;
00098 }
00099 
00103 void Document::ClearScene()
00104 {
00105         if ( m_scene )
00106         {
00107                 if ( m_scene )  while ( m_scene->getRefCount( ) > 1 )   m_scene->unref();
00108         }
00109 
00110     m_scene = 0;
00111 }
00112 
00116 bool Document::ReadFile( const QString& fileName )
00117 {
00118     if( TSceneKit* inputScene = static_cast< TSceneKit* >( GetSceneKitFromFile( fileName ) ) )
00119         {
00120         if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00121             m_scene = inputScene;
00122             m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );
00123             m_isModified = false;
00124             return true;
00125         }
00126         return false;
00127 }
00128 
00134 bool Document::WriteFile( const QString& fileName )
00135 {
00136     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
00137     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
00138         {
00139                 QString message = QString( "Cannot open file %1." ).arg( fileName );
00140                 emit Warning( message );
00141 
00142                 return false;
00143         }
00144 
00145     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00146         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
00147         SceneOuput.apply( m_scene );
00148         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
00149         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00150         m_isModified = false;
00151         return true;
00152 }
00153 
00157 bool Document::IsModified( )
00158 {
00159     return m_isModified;
00160 }
00161 
00165 TSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKit() const
00166 {
00167     return m_scene;
00168 }
00169 
00175 TSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKitFromFile( const QString& fileName )
00176 {
00177     SoInput sceneInput;
00178         if ( !sceneInput.openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
00179         {
00180                 QString message = QString( "Cannot open file %1." ).arg( fileName );
00181                 emit Warning( message );
00182 
00183                 return 0;
00184         }
00185 
00186         if( !sceneInput.isValidFile() )
00187         {
00188                 QString message = QString( "Error reading file %1.\n" ).arg( fileName );
00189                 emit Warning( message );
00190 
00191                 return 0;
00192         }
00193 
00194         SoSeparator* graphSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &sceneInput );
00195         sceneInput.closeFile();
00196 
00197         if ( !graphSeparator )
00198         {
00199                 QString message = QString( "Error reading file %1.\n" ).arg( fileName );
00200                 emit Warning( message );
00201 
00202                 return 0;
00203         }
00204 
00205    return static_cast< TSceneKit* >( graphSeparator->getChild(0) );
00206         return 0;
00207 }
